description:
As the situation at the hospital worsens, the memories that Setsuyo has awakened of her previous life awaken old wounds and misunderstandings. Setsuyo`s broken heart and rage fuels the much larger youkai that seems to be the root cause of all the trouble. Suusu and Haku Gessho are pulled into the fray as the confrontation between Setsuyo and Unhi only grows more desperate. Gessho attempts to sever the youkai tentacles that are feeding off of and manipulating everyone, but they will not be disconntected from Setsuyo and Unhi. Now it is up to Unhi to save his former lover before they are all destroyed.
Source: crunchyroll
